data.title: Patrick J. Loehrer, MD
data.meta_description:
Principal Investigator or Co-Principal Investigator in numerous currently active recently completed clinical protocols. These studies include not only university studies but also multi-institutional (ECOG and SECSG)and international intergroup studies.
Treatments in thymoma, GU (e.g. bladder cancer, testis cancer), GI cancer (e.g. pancreatic cancer, colon cancer, cancer).
data.text:
Bio

Principal Investigator or Co-Principal Investigator in numerous currently active recently completed clinical protocols. These studies include not only university studies but also multi-institutional (ECOG and SECSG)and international intergroup studies.

Treatments in thymoma, GU (e.g. bladder cancer, testis cancer), GI cancer (e.g. pancreatic cancer, colon cancer, cancer).
